title: Backup
description: Does a mysqldump of a remote database and uploads the mysqldump with a timestamp to a S3 bucket.

title: Account Service
description: Make passwords redundant. Let users sign in using magic links.

title: Webpage to PDF Service
description: Turn webpages into PDF's using Chrome's headless API.

title: Webpage to Image Service
description: Make screenshots of webpages using Chrome's headless API.

title: Notification Service
description: Push notifications via multiple channels. Push-notification, E-mail, SMS, Slack, Webhook, Monday, etc. Preview and interact with notification templates.

title: Job Queue Service
description: Monitor (recurrent) jobs that have been added to a Bull queue.

title: Data Explorer Service
description: Quickly display relational data based on a pre-defined schema. Extend with custom components.

title: Schema
description: Capture your data model in a schema.

title: Schema to GraphQL
description: Auto-generate a GraphQL API of your schema.

title: Table
description: Display, filter, sort and export your data collections across devices.

title: Page
description: Display record detail data and associated information in a flexible grid layout.

title: Fields
description: Intuitively display and edit your pieces of data.

title: Search Service
description: Search for data based on your schema.
